statements: SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'click' AND interaction_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT interaction_id, user_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id IN (101, 102, 103) ORDER BY interaction_id;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type, interaction_details FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_details LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY interaction_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT interaction_id, user_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like' AND interaction_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_details FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type IN ('comment', 'share') ORDER BY user_id ASC, interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(interaction_id) AS avg_interaction_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_interactions > 5;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type, DATE(interaction_timestamp) AS interaction_date FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'view' AND interaction_date = '2022-03-15';
SELECT * FROM user_interactions;
SELECT user_id, interaction_time, interaction_type FROM user_interactions;
SELECT user_id, interaction_time FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type='click';
SELECT interaction_type, user_id, interaction_time FROM user_interactions ORDER BY interaction_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, MAX(interaction_time) AS latest_interaction_time FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY interaction_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT interaction_type, COUNT(user_id) FROM user_interactions GROUP BY interaction_type;
SELECT preference_name, preference_value FROM user_preferences WHERE preference_value LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, interaction_time, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'click' ORDER BY user_id, interaction_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND preference_name = 'theme' ORDER BY user_id, preference_name;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE join_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM interactions WHERE interaction_date < NOW();
SELECT page_id, user_id, page_url FROM page_views ORDER BY visit_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE join_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT users.username, page_views.page_url FROM users JOIN page_views ON users.user_id = page_views.user_id WHERE page_url LIKE '%example.com%';

SELECT interactions.interaction_type, interactions.interaction_date, users.username FROM interactions INNER JOIN users ON interactions.user_id = users.user_id WHERE interaction_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_interactions, users.username FROM interactions JOIN users ON interactions.user_id = users.user_id GROUP BY users.username HAVING total_interactions > 10 ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT page_name, url FROM pages ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(session_id) AS session_count FROM user_sessions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT interaction_type, timestamp FROM interactions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT page_name, url FROM pages WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY page_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, page_id, start_time, end_time FROM user_sessions WHERE user_id = 'a1b2c3d4-e5f6-6a7b-8c9d-0e1f2a3b4c5d' AND end_time IS NULL;
SELECT interaction_type, timestamp FROM interactions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users u JOIN user_sessions s ON u.user_id = s.user_id WHERE s.start_time > '2022-04-01' GROUP BY username, email;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT page_name, url, created_date FROM pages ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT page_name, url, interaction_date FROM pages JOIN page_interactions ON pages.page_id = page_interactions.page_id;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT page_id, page_name, url, created_date FROM pages WHERE url LIKE '%example.com%' ORDER BY created_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, page_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM page_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'click' AND user_id = 1 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM analytics INNER JOIN user_interactions ON analytics.interaction_id = user_interactions.interaction_id WHERE user_interactions.user_id = 2 AND analytics.analytics_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) AS unique_users, AVG(LENGTH(username)) AS avg_username_length FROM users;
